name: Fortune, Fire and the Handyman
description:
can bad luck be transferred from one person to another? or will they always be damned, no matter what?

our first game jam game, designed along the theme of Joined Together, where you make choices about other people's lives, and then navigate the consequences. 

multiple endings but very short. probably only under an hour to play through and find all of the endings. 

by emily lord and georgia clarke :)

UPDATED VERSION WITH BUG FIX: 9PM GMT 17th June
